item.description: [1:1] Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ, through the will of God, and Timotheus the brother, to the assembly of God that is in Corinth, with all the saints who are in all Achaia: [1:2] Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ! [1:3] Blessed `is’ God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of the mercies, and God of all comfort,
